Container.Name: UniFi-Toolkit
Container.Overview: UniFi network management toolkit with Threat Watch (IDS/IPS monitoring), Wi-Fi Stalker (device tracking), and Network Pulse (real-time stats). Configure your UniFi controller via the web UI after first launch.

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Persistent storage for database and configuration

Config.Name: Encryption Key
Config.Description: Fernet encryption key for securing UniFi credentials. Generate with: python -c "from cryptography.fernet import Fernet; print(Fernet.generate_key().decode())"

Config.Name: UniFi Controller URL
Config.Description: URL of your UniFi controller (e.g. https://192.168.1.1). Can also be configured via the web UI.

Config.Name: UniFi API Key
Config.Description: API key for UniFi OS devices (UDM, UCG-Fiber, etc.). Generate in UniFi OS Settings > Admins > Create API Token.

Config.Name: UniFi Username
Config.Description: Username for legacy UniFi controllers (use API key instead for UniFi OS)

Config.Name: Verify SSL
Config.Description: Verify SSL certificates when connecting to UniFi controller (default: false)

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL

Config.Name: Stalker Refresh Interval
Config.Description: Wi-Fi Stalker device refresh interval in seconds
